PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-21131999-11-300,  RESOURCES,  ,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of KENNETH W. RICHARD VOLLMAN, of Calgary, Alberta, as a member of the National Energy Board to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years; and designation of KENNETH W. RICHARD VOLLMAN as Chairman of the National Energy Board to hold office during pleasure, effective June 3, 2000.
Attachments
precis:
Re-appointment of KENNETH W. RICHARD VOLLMAN, of Calgary, Alberta, as a
member of the National Energy Board to hold office during good behaviour
for a term of seven years; and designation of KENNETH W. RICHARD VOLLMAN
as Chairman of the National Energy Board to hold office during pleasure,
effective June 3, 2000.
